body_html: Are there many other ops for which resource variables are not supported yet? If that's the case then maybe I should go about supporting the current variable API and wait until there is more complete support for resource variables. What do you think is the best approach for now?
body_text: Are there many other ops for which resource variables are not supported yet? If that's the case then maybe I should go about supporting the current variable API and wait until there is more complete support for resource variables. What do you think is the best approach for now?
body: Are there many other ops for which resource variables are not supported yet? If that's the case then maybe I should go about supporting the current variable API and wait until there is more complete support for resource variables. What do you think is the best approach for now?
